message: Let's split the money 60-40, a fair start to the game!
You're being too greedy, let's meet in the middle!
Meet me in the middle, but with a slight tilt towards me this time!
You're not serious about meeting in the middle, I'll try again!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more for myself!
You're not giving me enough, I'll take a slightly larger share this time!
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need a bit more for myself!
I'm getting a bit desperate, but I still think I deserve a bigger share!
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need to get closer to my target!
I'm not backing down, I think I deserve a bigger share, but I'm willing to compromise!
I'm getting close to my target, but I'm willing to make a final compromise!
This is my final offer, I'm not going to budge any further!
